row.name: JOBS.WIN.TECHNICAL_FLOW.ENV_PROV.ADD.JSON
row.description: Create an initial VM NI2 Json file

row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
:set &HND_LINE# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'{') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"virtualMachine": {') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"id": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"auditabilite": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"name": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"status": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"description": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"dns": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"prestataire": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"hyperviseur": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"serviceSupervision": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"accessibilite": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"centreService": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"facturation": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"outilSupervision": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"serviceStockage": "true",') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"installationDate": true,') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"startDate": true,') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"os": {"id": "true"},') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"sla": {"id": "true"},') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"vcpu": {"count": true,"frequency": true},') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'"vmemory": {"allocated": true}') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'}') :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,'}') :set &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND_LINE#,&JSON_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,APPEND) :close_process &HND_LINE#
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
